title: Clinical Application Physiology Education Using Team-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental physiology and medical terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: VR simulation-enhanced clinical case application training for workplace-focused physiology education for professionals

learning_goals: Through team collaboration, learners analyze physiological mechanisms and propose clinical problem-solving strategies.
Learners can present three or more examples explaining interactions between various body systems in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can demonstrate knowledge application skills improved by 20% or more compared to baseline in module-specific assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
